testimonials.name: Kumar Chaitanya
testimonials.review: Avi's newsletters are really inspiring and motivating. It is very knowledgeable. I always wait for his newsletters so that I could get to know about some more interesting stuff related to the coding world. Best way to start a day.

testimonials.name: Shubham Soni
testimonials.review: Hello Avi, I've been following your posts on medium, Twitter since past 1 year. The content you put in your posts is really helpful for someone who really wants to become a good web developer. Just wanted to let you know that.

testimonials.name: Nitanshu Vashistha
testimonials.review: I've been following you on LinkedIn and GitHub from quite some time and you are an inspiration to me. I am also a subscriber of your mailing list and I loved the last article. I am trying to incorporate the tips you shared on time management and the results are positive.
